skincareTypes.detail: The customized facials will be rejuvenating and designed for your individual skin needs, whether it be anti-aging brightening, acne, or sun damaged skin. Leave it to the experts and just let us know your concerns and how much time of relaxation you would like.

This treatment is perfect for all skin types from acne, aging/sun damaged skin, teens to even rosacea. It will deeply cleanse & exfoliate with no irritation or inflammation and repairs on a deeper level than other facials. Over time with a series of ultrasonic treatments it will combat aging skin, manage rosacea, clear acne, reduce pore size and hyper-pigmentation.
A great way for teens to take care of their skin at the spa, but also learn how to care for their skin at home.

skincare.detail: Includes a skin analysis, cleanse, exfoliation, light extractions, face massage or neck massage (neck massage includesa mask).
Includes a skin analysis, cleanse, exfoliation, extractions, mask and massage of the face, neck, shoulders, arms and hands.
Everything from the 60 minute facial with an extra 30 minutes of massage.
All the clinical parts of the ultrasonic treatment with no massage.
All the clinical parts of the ultrasonic treatment with massage of the face, neck, shoulders, arms and hands.
Everything from the 75 minute ultrasonic with extra 30 minutes of massage.
Basic cleanse, exfoliation, mask and light extraction
Removes surface dead skin cells and vellus hair, which brightens the skin and gives healthier, more radiant appearance.

skincare.price: Starting at $50 (Half off when added to any facial)
skincare.detail: Treat premature aging, sundamage, hyper-pigmentation and wrinkles/fine lines as well as improving skin radiance and texture.
Helps combat fine lines and wrinkles, puffiness and sagging with and ultrasonic infusion.
Exfoliates, hydrates and plumps with collagen, vitamin E & C and multi peptides to help give the lips a plumper, fuller and more youthful appearance.

bridal.detail: Wedding Day Applications...This includes me traveling if needed within 70 miles round trip on the wedding day, a new set of lashes for each application.
This includes Bridesmaids, Mothers, Family, Friends, etc makeup ppplication and it inncludes lashes if desired.
This includes Bridesmaids, Mothers, Family, Friends, etc makeup ppplication and it includes lashes if desired and Lipstick OR Gloss to keep.
This mini-makeup application is for girls under the age of 13 years old only. Under 6 years old is complimentary.
Makeup applications for engagement photos, bridal shower and bachelorette party. Please ask for pricing if interested
Prices apply for anyone else in your wedding party as well.
Please ask about Skincare treatments, Waxing, Brow and Lash Tinting, Lash Lifting and Lash Extensions if you are interested in any spa treatments prior to your wedding.

I will present you with a contract on the day of the Trial Run in which I ask the Bride to pay in FULL to me that day as well. I ONLY accept Cash or Credit Card. as a form of payment from all recipients, NO PERSONAL CHECKS. If you have any questions at all for me, please do not hesitate to ask. Thank you for your consideration and I hope to be working with you soon!
